mapper.select: SELECT l.leave_id AS leaveId, l.leave_type AS leaveType, l.doc_id AS docId, l.reason AS reason, l.leave_unit_type AS leaveUnitType, l.start_date AS startDate, l.end_date AS endDate, l.leave_days AS leaveDays, l.requested_at AS requestedAt, ad.status AS approvalStatus, NULL AS empName FROM emp_leave l LEFT JOIN approval_document ad ON l.doc_id = ad.doc_id WHERE l.emp_id = #{empId} AND l.is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY l.start_date DESC

SELECT l.leave_id AS leaveId, l.leave_type AS leaveType, l.doc_id AS docId, l.reason AS reason, l.leave_unit_type AS leaveUnitType, l.start_date AS startDate, l.end_date AS endDate, l.leave_days AS leaveDays, l.requested_at AS requestedAt, e.name AS empName, d.dept_name AS departmentName, ad.status AS approvalStatus FROM emp_leave l JOIN employee e ON l.emp_id = e.emp_id LEFT JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN approval_document ad ON l.doc_id = ad.doc_id WHERE e.dept_id = (SELECT dept_id FROM employee WHERE emp_id = #{requestorEmpId}) AND l.is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY l.start_date DESC
